member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.Ruler.NegatedX
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the horizontal scale should show negated values, simulating that the coordinate system's X axis grows to the left.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.Ruler.NegatedY
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the vertical scale should show negated values, simulating that the coordinate system's Y axis grows to the top.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.Ruler._timer
member.summary: This timer is intended to perform update operations on regular intervals of time, thus fixing repaint issues when diagram is modified programmatically.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.Ruler.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.ItemToShape(System.Object)
member.summary: ListBox Items collection does not contain ShapeTemplates directly, but an opaque object. To access the Shape object use method ItemToShape

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.ShapeToItem(MindFusion.Diagramming.Shape)
member.summary: The complement to ItemToShape. Could be used to insert a Shape object to the Items collection at a specified index. This does not search an existing item, but creates a new one without adding it to the Items collection.

member.summary: Invalidate the specified Shape causing it to be redrawn. Call this when the shape changes

member.summary: Gets or sets the shapes displayed in the list box.

member.summary: Allow inline renaming of listbox items by pressing F2. Currently listbox displays shape ids as names

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeListBox.AllowRemove
member.summary: Allow deletion of listbox items by pressing Del. Only listbox items are deleted - not the source of shapes.
